message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay up to $1,600,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I value your interest, I'm not quite ready to accept $1,600,000.  I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. This reflects a significant compromise on my end, but also acknowledges the value you place on the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,625,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
